snippet: Firefighters fought a wildfire today that started on Saturday in a legal shooting area and raged over more than 1,200 acres, destroying 13 homes and cabins, officials said.    The blaze was threatening the town here in the San Gabriel Mountains af...
lead_paragraph: Firefighters fought a wildfire today that started on Saturday in a legal shooting area and raged over more than 1,200 acres, destroying 13 homes and cabins, officials said. The blaze was threatening the town here in the San Gabriel Mountains after forcing the evacuation of hundreds of homes in the nearby communities of Fredalba, Live Oak and Smiley Park.
abstract: Firefighters move against wildfire on shooting range in Running Springs, Calif, which burned more than 1,200 acres and destroyed 13 homes and cabins (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; Shooting Range Fire Burns 1,200 Acres
